description:
Their Berrino jacket for men is the functional all-round skiing companion when less is more.

With its ribbed inner structure, Tasmanian merino wool ensures excellent insulation and feels pleasant on the skin. The outer of this lightweight softshell jacket offers scuff resistance and protection against wind and weather. Its elastic two-way stretch material adapts to your every move.

High-quality details such as elasticated seam and sleeve cuffs with hidden thumb loops, bonded jacket seam and two-layer collar lend this lightweight softshell jacket a clean, puristic look.

The Berrino jacket for men is thus a reliable all-rounder for pure ski touring enjoyment.
name: Ortovox Berrino Jacket - Mens
